alert_uuid.description: The Unique identifier of the alert

channel.description: The channel the message posts in. Use the channel’s name and not the display name, e.g. use town-square, not Town Square.

api_key.description: The Sekoia.io API-Key to read the alert content.

base_url.description: Base URL of Sekoia.io api (e.g. https://api.sekoia.io/).

pretext.description: An optional line of text that will be shown above the alert
